Translations.Text: Buyao rang tamen de caichan he ernu shi ni xianmu, an la zhi xiang jie ci zai jinshi shenghuo zhong chengfa tamen, er tamen de linghun jiang zai tamen bu xinyang de qingkuang xia li qu.
Tamen yi an la fashi: Tamen que shi nimen de tongdao, qishi, tamen bing bushi nimen de tongdao, dan tamen [wei xinzhe] shi danqie de minzhong.
Jiaru tamen neng zhaodao yige binan chu, huo shandong, huo didao, name, tamen biding cang huang tao wang nali.
Tamen zhong youren zai fenpei jiuji pin shang feibang ni. Jiaru fen gei tamen yi fen, tamen jiu gaoxing; jiaru bu fen gei tamen, tamen jiu fennu [zhu].

Jiaru tamen manzu yu an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] ciyu tamen de bing shuo:“An la dui women zugoule, an la jiang ba ta de enhui ciyu women, ta de shizhe [mu sheng] ye yiyang [fen gei women jiuji pin]. Women que shi keqiu an la [shi women fuyu] de.”

Tian ke [zhu 1][huo jiuji pin] zhi neng gei qiongren, pinmin [zhu 2], wei ci gongzuo zhe [shoufa tian ke zhe huo shoufa jiuji pin zhe], xiyin qi xin qingxiang [yisilan jiao] zhe, wei nuli shushen, qian zhai zhe, wei an la zhi dao gongzuo zhe, luxing zaojie zhe, zhe shi an la de faling. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

Tamen zhong youren wangtu shanghai xianzhi [mu sheng]. Tamen shuo:“Ta zhishi yi zhi [chuansong xiaoxi de] erduo eryi.” Ni shuo:“Ta zhi ting dui nimen zui hao de, ta quexin an la, xinren xinshimen, shi nimen zhongxinshi di fu hui.” Fan wangtu shanghai an la de shizhe [mu sheng] de renmen, tamen bi shou tongku de xingfa.
